title: Under Armour Men's Tech 2.0 V-Neck Short-Sleeve T-Shirt
description: UA Tech is our original go-to training gear: loose, light, and it keeps you cool. That's why this men's training T-shirt is everything you need.
Loose: Fuller cut for complete comfort.
Material wicks sweat & dries really fast
UA Tech fabric is quick-drying, ultra-soft & has a more natural feel. Material wicks sweat & dries really fast. New, streamlined fit & shaped hem.
